subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Jake White, who led South Africa to a World Cup victory in 2007, will take charge of ACT Brumbies, a Super Rugby team in Australia with a history of player revolts.
snippet: Jake White, who led South Africa to a World Cup victory in 2007, will take charge of ACT Brumbies, a Super Rugby team in Australia with a history of player revolts.
